adjective.description: Of, relating to, or characteristic of a plesiosaur; belonging to the infraorder Plesiosauria.

noun.description: A reptile of the order Plesiosauria; a plesiosaur..

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in Richard Owen (1804–1892), comparative anatomist and palaeontologist. From either plesiosaur or Plesiosaurus + -ian.
